mapper.update: update b_diary set weather = #{weather,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mood = #{mood,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, week = #{week,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, context = #{context,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
